name: Anno 1602: Creation of a New World - New Islands, New Adventure
summary:
Anno 1602: Creation of a New World - New Islands, New Adventure is the official expansion pack to Anno 1602: Creation of a New World. It includes many new features like volcano eruptions, new films and music, advanced management for the trade routes, improved control over your units in battles and a general overhaul of the AI.

Also included is a new level editor to plan custom missions and campaigns. The expansion already features six new campaigns and twenty new single scenarios.

This expansion was only released for the German version of the game. The US release, which was originally released more than a year after the German version, already includes the features of this add-on.
